summary: Legends speak of the Lost Men, known to guard powerful artifacts. Now, for the first time in millenia, they have decided to bring one of their artifacts into the world. The trail begins in the land of dragons, where the earth touches the sky.
descriptionHtml:
Legends speak of an ancient order known as the Lost Men, known to guard powerful artifacts. Now, for the first time in millenia, they have decided to bring one of their artifacts into the world. However, the Lost Men do not freely hand out their treasures; it must be found, must be uncovered. The trail begins in the land of dragons, where the earth touches the sky.

Clue 1:
Beyond the chambers of the lord 
\'top dragon\'s head and whispering door 
watching over clouds and wind
author: DealerUmbra
